title: Lonely Thanksgivings & Alter Egos (w/ Ramon Rivas)
description: Jay tries to convince Jacob to attend A Very Johnson Thanksgiving or go with Oakerson's for the holiday. After Dan is recognized on the street for being “McFee” from Showtime’s Billions the host discuss alternative names and personalities of the crew.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
